name: Solitaire Fish Klondike
description:
Solitaire Fish is a fun and relaxing card game on iOS and App Store. It combines the classic solitaire gameplay and cute little fishes. Solitaire is also known as the Klondike.

Solitaire Fish has beautifully designed graphics, various little fishes, and a smooth gaming experience. It's totally free and can be played offline anytime, anywhere! It will help you to keep your brain smart & sharp.

== BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED THEME ==

Based on the solitaire gameplay, you can explore the sea world and meet cute little fishes with a clean and serene design. While you are challenging yourself and exercising your brain, cute little fishes will relax your nerves.

== SMOOTH GAMING EXPERIENCE ==

In the game, the smooth game experience will make you better immersed in thinking. When all the decks are turned over, you can quickly complete the game through auto-collect.

== LEVEL UP REWARDS ==

As you progress by one level, we will have generous prizes for you. Magic will help you solve the game faster and better in your future games. Cute little fish will decorate your game background.

== RELAX AND CHALLENGING ==

The difficulty of the game will increase as you level up, bringing you appropriate incentives and challenges. We have an automatic reminder function, but you can turn it off at any time and use your mind to solve the game.

== FEATURES ==

- Draw 1 card or Draw 3 cards
- Unlimited free undo
- Unlimited free hints
- Timer mode
- Left-handed mode
- Single tap or drag&drop to move cards
- Auto-collect cards on completion
- Auto-save game in play
- Track your records
- Play offline! No wifi required

Simple and addicting!

Play classic solitaire card games for free right from your phone! Download Solitaire now!
